title: Thomas says government institutions shouldn't be 'bullied' following leak of draft opinion on abortion - CNN
content:
1. Thomas says government institutions shouldn't be 'bullied' following leak of draft opinion on abortion  CNN
  2. Clarence Thomas references Roe v. Wade draft opinion leak, says Supreme Court can't be 'bullied'  Fox News
  3. Clarence Thomas says he worries respect for institutions is eroding  The Washington Post
  4. After 'Roe' Leak, Clarence Thomas Is Concerned About Court Being 'Bullied'  The Daily Beast
  5. Sean Hannity rips Democrats' 'mass hysteria' over leaked Justice Alito's draft opinion  Fox News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Justice Clarence Thomas, following the leak of a draft majority opinion overturning Roe v. Wade, said Friday that government institutions shouldn't be "bullied" into delivering what some see as the preferred outcome.
